description: This file defines an ApiClient class for managing HTTP API requests, including token storage, request building, and handling GET and POST requests with authorization support. It also defines an exception class for API errors.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A singleton class providing methods for managing API requests, including token management, request construction, and response handling.

classes.name: ApiException
classes.description: An exception class for handling API error responses, encapsulating status code and response body.

methods.name: getToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored authentication token from shared preferences.

methods.name: setToken
methods.description: Stores or removes the authentication token in shared preferences.

methods.name: buildUri
methods.description: Constructs a Uri object based on a base URL, path, and optional query parameters.

methods.name: _defaultHeaders
methods.description: Generates default headers for HTTP requests, including authorization if token is provided.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the specified path with optional query parameters, headers, and authorization.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs a POST request to the specified path with an optional body, headers, and authorization.

methods.name: _throwIfNotOk
methods.description: Checks the HTTP response status code and throws an ApiException if the response indicates an error.
